src:
Tumis Sosis Telur yang Gurih Praktis Buat Sarapan
05 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Odilia Winneke Setiawati - detikFood


Foto: iStock

Jakarta - Bosan dengan telur dadar dan telur mata sapi, cobalah olah telur dengan paduan sosis dan paprika. Rasanya lebih gurih, sedikit renyah dan makin enak.Sosis merupakan salah satu olahan daging yang populer di dunia. Meskipun berasal dari Eropa, sosis kini populer di dunia. Ada yang diisi daging unggas, daging sapi, daging kambing dan daging babi. Bukan hanya jenis daging, tetapi sosis kini juga diberi beragam bumbu rempah.Jenis sosis Frankfruter dan Wiener atau sosis hotdog. Pilih sosis yang berkualitas bagus. Sosis merupakan produk yang sudah dimasak karena itu, tak perlu dimasak terlalu lama. Cukup rebus sebentar dalam air mendidih atau iris kasar dan tumis hingga agak kecokelatan.



Baca juga: 
Resep Orak-arik Telur Jamur yang Gurih dan Praktis Buat Sarapan





Foto: iStock

Untuk membuat Tumis Sosis Telur caranya sangat praktis, ikuti saja beberapa langkah mudah ini.1. Bahan-bahanSiapkan 1 sdm mentega, 1/4 butir bawang bombay, iris tipis, 2 buah sosis iris serong/melintang, 1/2 paprika hijau/merah, iris tipis, 3 butir telur ayam, 1/2 sdt merica bubuk dan 1/2 sdt garam.2. Tumis bawang dan sosisTumis irisan sosis dengan seidkit mentega hingga berubah warna. Angkat dan sisihkan. Kemudian tumis bawang bombay dan paprika hingga layu. Masukkan sosis tumis, kecilkan api.


Foto: iStock

3. Tambah TelurPecahkan 2 butir telur ayam ke dalam wajan, masak hingga agak membeku. Pecahkan 1 butir telur di tengah tumisan sosis, tutup wajan. Masak 2 menit hingga telur beku dan mulai mengering pinggirnya. Angkat dan sajikan hangat. Sajikan dengan nasi hangat atau roti panggang.Simak Video " Telur Asin Pedas dari Bumi Parahyangan, Nikmat Banget!"[Gambas:Video 20detik](odi/odi)
text:
Saute Savory Egg Sausage Practical For Breakfast
05 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Odilia Winneke Setiawati - detikFood


Photo: iStock

Jakarta - Bored with omelette and sunny side up eggs, try processing eggs with sausage and paprika blend. It tastes more tasty, a little crispy and more delicious. Sausage is one of the most popular processed meat in the world. Although originating from Europe, sausages are now popular in the world. Some are filled with poultry, beef, mutton and pork. Not only the type of meat, but sausages are now also given a variety of spices. Types of sausages Frankfruter and Wiener or sausage hot dogs. Choose good quality sausages. Sausages are products that have already been cooked. Simply boil briefly in boiling water or roughly sliced and sauteed until slightly browned.



Also read:
Tasty and practical scrambled mushroom eggs recipe for breakfast





Photo: iStock

To make Sauteed Egg Sausage in a very practical way, just follow a few easy steps. Ingredients Prepare 1 tablespoon of butter, 1/4 onion, thinly sliced, 2 pieces of sliced / transverse sausage, 1/2 green / red paprika, thinly sliced, 3 chicken eggs, 1/2 teaspoon ground pepper and 1 / 2 teaspoons salt.2. Saut√© the onion and sausage Saute the sausage with a slice of butter until it changes color. Lift and set aside. Then saute onions and paprika until wilted. Add sausage stir-fry, reduce heat.


Photo: iStock

3. Add Eggs Break 2 chicken eggs into the pan, cook until slightly frozen. Crack 1 egg in the middle of a sausage stir, cover the pan. Cook for 2 minutes until the eggs freeze and begin to dry the edges. Lift and serve warm. Serve with warm rice or toast. Listen to the video "Spicy Salted Eggs from Parahyangan Earth, Really Delicious!" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (odi / odi)
